title: PATCH 7.18 PACKET LOSS
body: Ever since I updated to patch 7.18, my ping has been wayyy higher. On 7.17 I consistently had 59 ms. But ever since the update my ping has been hovering in the 80s and it is nearly unplayable for me. The slight delay just makes the game not fun and stressful to play. Just wondering if this is fixable or if anyone else has had ping issues since the patch. I will probably just uninstall if there's nothing I can do because 85 ping is not fun to play on...

replies.body: Still having this issue since patch 7.19

Same, my ping is up from 37 to 57, really bothering me. A fix would be nice... Never had an issue with a patch or my ping that I have suspected was on Riot's end before this and I've played since season 1...

EDIT: My ping is back to normal! Not sure where the issue lied but I am back at my regular range...

Same issue.
Just played my first game of today and my ping increased from 21 to 32 and I'm getting a lot of packet loss too.

If this is sudden, I'm pretty confident this can get fixed up!  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of the impacted games so we can get a better overview of what's going on.  The results should also offer some troubleshooting specific to your case, but let me know what you find.
